# The `ARMIncomingValueHandler` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Helper class for values coming in through an ABI boundary (used for handling formal arguments and call return values). <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Helper class for values coming in through an ABI boundary (used for handling formal arguments and call return values).

### getStackAddress() {#ab81aa7a77f61bbabb3f265712cd8ad53}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Register anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ARMCallLowering.cpp&#125;::ARMIncomingValueHandler::getStackAddress (uint64&#95;t MemSize, int64&#95;t Offset, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> &amp; MPO, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> Flags)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Materialize a VReg containing the address of the specified stack-based object.

This is either based on a FrameIndex or direct SP manipulation, depending on the context. <code>MPO</code> should be initialized to an appropriate description of the address created.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-cpp/#l00246">246</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-cpp">ARMCallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### markPhysRegUsed() {#a0ee2d17f3a98009aaf10e193bbeea24e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ARMCallLowering.cpp&#125;::ARMIncomingValueHandler::markPhysRegUsed (unsigned PhysReg)</>}>
Marking a physical register as used is different between formal parameters, where it&#39;s a basic block live-in, and call returns, where it&#39;s an implicit-def of the call instruction.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-cpp/#l00357">357</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armcalllowering-cpp">ARMCallLowering.cpp</a>.
